Ingredients : Water, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Disodium EDTA, Polyquaternium-10, Fragrance, PEG-150 Distearate, Citric Acid, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, PEG-80 Sorbitan Laurate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside Usage : Remove safety seal to open.
